extension.name: Moolah E-Commerce for Joomla
extension.author: Moolah E-Commerce
extension.description:
Moolah E-Commerce Store

Moolah provides a single-page, mobile-ready checkout for selling premium goods and business services.

Key Features:

  • Your store will load into the current page of your site, and each step of the checkout loads smoothly into the current page.
  • A Moolah store can adjust automatically to whatever device the customer is using, and support both desktop and mobile devices..
  • You can easily place your Moolah store into any website, including Joomla, Wordpress, or even a normal HTML webpage.
  • Your store can be deployed to several sites at the same time, yet managed from one central location.
